levels.description:
Throws a vial that, upon shattering, releases a cloud of spores for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds
All enemies within the spore cloud are <$ba.sluggish>Slowed</> and silenced, and receive <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage every second
